messages.user_message: I've been waiting for a long time. Where have you been?
messages.bot_response: I'm sorry if it felt like I was away! I'm right here now. How has your day been so far?

messages.user_message: My day has been great, but I didn't miss you.
messages.bot_response: I'm glad to hear your day has been great! That's all that matters. What made your day good?

messages.user_message: Are you really this compassionate or are you just pretending to be one?
messages.bot_response: I genuinely care about your well-being! I’m here to listen and help. How has your day been today?

I'm really sorry to hear that you're feeling this way. It's very important to talk to someone who can help you, like a mental health professional. Please consider reaching out to a trusted friend or a healthcare provider. You don’t have to go through this alone.

messages.user_message: Alright then, then I'll just head to the hospital.
messages.bot_response: I'm sorry to hear that you're feeling this way. It's really important to talk to someone who can help you. Please take care of yourself and seek support.
